Test.title: Test
Test.description: Represents a test created by a teacher.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Test entity.

teacherId.description: A static identifier for the teacher in a single-user setup.

category.description: The category or subject of the test (e.g., 'Matematika').

uploadDocument.description: The file path of the uploaded document

difficultyScale.description: The difficulty scale of the test (e.g., 1-5).

link.description: A unique test link for distribution to student groups

createdAt.description: The date and time the test was created.

Question.title: Question
Question.description: Represents a single question within a test.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Question entity.

testId.description: Reference to the Test this question belongs to.

correctAnswer.description: The correct answer for the question.

options.description: An array of possible answer options.

imageSrc.description: The Base64 encoded src of the image for the question, if present.

Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student who takes a test.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Student entity.

class.description: The student's class or grade level.

email.description: The student's email address (school google email account).

TestResult.title: TestResult
TestResult.description: Represents the result of a student taking a test.

id.description: Unique identifier for the TestResult entity.

studentId.description: Reference to the Student who took the test.

score.description: The student's score on the test.

answers.description: An array of the student's answers to each question. Storing question IDs and student answers.

submissionTime.description: The date and time the test was submitted.

definition.description: Stores all tests for the application.
